title: kaigeta
author: kaigeta
created_time: December 16, 2023, 08:28:42 PMLast edit: December 18, 2024, 04:55:46 PM by kaigeta
content: The Jackdaw Project, inspired by the 42coin project, aims to be the token with the highest face value on the Ravencoin blockchain. Only 50 coins will ever exist, and they've been distributed to over 20,000 Ravencoin addresses.Announced a few months ago, the project just finished its initial distribution phase. That being said, Jackdaw is widely available on several different Ravencoin Assets platforms.Tokenomics:Parent Blockchain: RavencoinToken Type: Ravencoin Main Asset TokenGithub: https://github.com/RavenProjectWhitepaper: https://jackdawtoken.com/jackdaw-whitepaperTotal Token Supply: 50 Jackdaw TokensFounders Reward: 0, all Jackdaw have been distributed to the general publicDistribution method: Mixed. Jackdaw was distributed socially via Airdrops/Giveaways/Contests/Promotions.Conplete distribution history available on the website: https://jackdawtoken.com/jackdaw-distributionResourcesWebsite: https://jackdawtoken.com/Twitter: https://twitter.com/JackdawCryptoTelegram: https://t.me/+nkh3L2FvyehlMTQxDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/MAAS7et4vUFaucet: https://www.rocketraven.net/u/TheBirdhouse/faucetExchange: Neoxa Asset Portal Exchangehttps://neoxa.app/Jackdaw Exchange ChannelLink to channel: https://discord.com/invite/8Kfg2BdW2wHow-to Video on YouTube: https://youtu.be/g3DxO4fP6fI?si=LuEFHDJoYcN2Q1ucAtomic Swap via Electrum Ravencoin WalletHow-to video on X: https://x.com/JackdawCrypto/status/1753609600874516707?s=20How-to Video on Youtube: https://youtu.be/Dq8JbBraGn4?si=2lots-lGoxE0dTYzNFT-style listing on RocketRaven.netHow-to video on X: https://x.com/JackdawCrypto/status/1753870340059472274?s=20 How-to video on Youtube: https://youtu.be/UVSh-AgbH-Y?si=3164YYOK54BPXYQB

comments.author: kaigeta
comments.body: The distribution phase for Jackdaw has officially ended and the community is working on an exchange listing for 2024! Check out the full recap of the distribution phase here on the Jackdaw website: https://jackdawtoken.com/jackdaw-distribution

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Wait, umm... so there's no token sale and all 50 tokens are distributed freely, either by airdrop or by faucet, correct? And you aimed to be the highest priced token? Do you have plan to achieve this? Given the token are gained for free, I think most will dump it right away at the slightest chance without considering any value, since they get it for free.

comments.author: kaigeta
comments.body: Quote from: holydarkness on December 29, 2023, 07:25:23 PMWait, umm... so there's no token sale and all 50 tokens are distributed freely, either by airdrop or by faucet, correct? And you aimed to be the highest priced token? Do you have plan to achieve this? Given the token are gained for free, I think most will dump it right away at the slightest chance without considering any value, since they get it for free.Interesting take! You are correct in that all tokens were distributed for free, via airdrop, faucet, or social giveaways around the Ravencoin ecosystem. We're currently working on an exchange listing & trading support within the Ravencoin ecosystem to test your theory. Many of the top holders are active Ravencoin users who see value in the project, but time will tell if they'll quickly sell their holdings or only trade in fractions.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: kaigeta on December 31, 2023, 11:54:11 PMQuote from: holydarkness on December 29, 2023, 07:25:23 PMWait, umm... so there's no token sale and all 50 tokens are distributed freely, either by airdrop or by faucet, correct? And you aimed to be the highest priced token? Do you have plan to achieve this? Given the token are gained for free, I think most will dump it right away at the slightest chance without considering any value, since they get it for free.Interesting take! You are correct in that all tokens were distributed for free, via airdrop, faucet, or social giveaways around the Ravencoin ecosystem. We're currently working on an exchange listing & trading support within the Ravencoin ecosystem to test your theory. Many of the top holders are active Ravencoin users who see value in the project, but time will tell if they'll quickly sell their holdings or only trade in fractions.Forgive me for not being familiar with this chain, but where can I see how much is being hold by each of these top holders and how many of these holders are the team? I also peek at your channel and umm... there aren't much members on it? Those on the channel are all of the holders?

comments.author: kaigeta
comments.created_time: January 03, 2024, 05:40:14 PMLast edit: January 03, 2024, 06:40:04 PM by kaigeta
comments.body: Quote from: holydarkness on January 02, 2024, 07:54:26 AMQuote from: kaigeta on December 31, 2023, 11:54:11 PMQuote from: holydarkness on December 29, 2023, 07:25:23 PMWait, umm... so there's no token sale and all 50 tokens are distributed freely, either by airdrop or by faucet, correct? And you aimed to be the highest priced token? Do you have plan to achieve this? Given the token are gained for free, I think most will dump it right away at the slightest chance without considering any value, since they get it for free.Interesting take! You are correct in that all tokens were distributed for free, via airdrop, faucet, or social giveaways around the Ravencoin ecosystem. We're currently working on an exchange listing & trading support within the Ravencoin ecosystem to test your theory. Many of the top holders are active Ravencoin users who see value in the project, but time will tell if they'll quickly sell their holdings or only trade in fractions.Forgive me for not being familiar with this chain, but where can I see how much is being hold by each of these top holders and how many of these holders are the team? I also peek at your channel and umm... there aren't much members on it? Those on the channel are all of the holders? No worries! You can look up the token on any Ravencoin Asset Explorer.Here's a popular one: https://rvn.cryptoscope.io/asset/?asset_id=043198f7b74a1745ff1fa7c68ce14babce32a658In regard to the discord (and our other social channels), we just launched them a few days ago so people are still filtering in, the token has been distributed to over 20,000 Ravencoin addresses, though some holders may not participate in social as much as others. There are zero holders that are "members of the team" as there is no team. Jackdaw was 100% distributed with no founders reward or tokens set aside.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: kaigeta on January 03, 2024, 05:40:14 PMQuote from: holydarkness on January 02, 2024, 07:54:26 AMForgive me for not being familiar with this chain, but where can I see how much is being hold by each of these top holders and how many of these holders are the team? I also peek at your channel and umm... there aren't much members on it? Those on the channel are all of the holders?[image snip]No worries! You can look up the token on any Ravencoin Asset Explorer.Here's a popular one: https://rvn.cryptoscope.io/asset/?asset_id=043198f7b74a1745ff1fa7c68ce14babce32a658In regard to the discord, we just launched it a few days ago so people are still filtering in, the token has been distributed to over 20,000 Ravencoin addresses, though some holders may not participate in social as much as others. There are zero holders that are "members of the team" as there is no team. Jackdaw was 100% distributed with no founders reward or tokens set aside.Interesting. How do you plan to set the initial price? Will it be like the old projects that "leave it to the market" where the first person selling the token will set the price? Or will it be predetermined through a system like a vote?

comments.author: kaigeta
comments.body: Quote from: holydarkness on January 03, 2024, 06:02:42 PMQuote from: kaigeta on January 03, 2024, 05:40:14 PMQuote from: holydarkness on January 02, 2024, 07:54:26 AMForgive me for not being familiar with this chain, but where can I see how much is being hold by each of these top holders and how many of these holders are the team? I also peek at your channel and umm... there aren't much members on it? Those on the channel are all of the holders?[image snip]No worries! You can look up the token on any Ravencoin Asset Explorer.Here's a popular one: https://rvn.cryptoscope.io/asset/?asset_id=043198f7b74a1745ff1fa7c68ce14babce32a658In regard to the discord, we just launched it a few days ago so people are still filtering in, the token has been distributed to over 20,000 Ravencoin addresses, though some holders may not participate in social as much as others. There are zero holders that are "members of the team" as there is no team. Jackdaw was 100% distributed with no founders reward or tokens set aside.Interesting. How do you plan to set the initial price? Will it be like the old projects that "leave it to the market" where the first person selling the token will set the price? Or will it be predetermined through a system like a vote?We're going to do it old school ("leave it to the market") and allow for public price discovery to set the price. We've currently reached out to several exchanges such as Safe.Trade, OKX, & Xeggex to help the listing process along. Thanks so much for your questions!

comments.author: kaigeta
comments.body: We're excited to introduce the Jackdaw Exchange Channel! Now you can buy and sell Jackdaw and other Ravencoin Assets directly from the Jackdaw Discord Server. Get involved with the project while price discovery is still ongoing and the markets are shaping up. All you need to get started is a Ravencoin Address and a Discord account! Now there are three great ways to get started buying and selling Jackdaw while the project is still young. Users can perform Atomic Swaps with Electrum, create auctions on RocketRaven.net, or they can trade right from Discord in the Jackdaw Exchange Channel.Jackdaw Website: https://jackdawtoken.com/Link to channel: https://discord.com/invite/8Kfg2BdW2wHow-to Video on YouTube: https://youtu.be/g3DxO4fP6fI?si=LuEFHDJoYcN2Q1uc

comments.author: kaigeta
comments.body: Jackdaw has officially had its first exchange listing! Now you can earn on your Jackdaw by adding to the $JDAW liquidity pool or buy and sell your Jackdaw with ease! Currently price discovery is ongoing, get involved with one of the most decentralized tokens in the space at the ground floor!Get started trading Jackdaw: https://neoxa.app/
